description: This module aims to introduce modern concepts and methods Quantum Information Processing, which provides broad, solid foundations in modern topics of quantum information science. Subjects covered include - Entanglement, tensor networks, matrix product states - Topological quantum computation - Coding and error correction - Quantum algorithms - Physical implementations of quantum computation and information processing - Majorana physics.
faculty: NUS Graduate Sch for Int Science and Engineering
title: Quantum Information Processing
